description:
The chance meeting with Hinata, the Kingdom of Falmuth`s attack, Rimuru`s evolution to Demon Lord—Veldora and Ifrit have been watching all of these chaotic events from within Rimuru`s stomach. It`s been two years since Rimuru and Veldora met in that cave, and now the promise they made there is about to be fulfilled. Veldora and Ifrit look back on everything that`s happened around Tempest, sometimes trembling with fear, but always at their own unique pace.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 閑話: ヴェルドラ日記2
